revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=WNR2000 |revision=v3 |fcc_date=09/15/2010 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Delta Networks |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PY310200135 |ic_id=4054A-10200135 |pcb_id=2976355102 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR7240 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L3206EM2I |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5DU2562GTR-E3C |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header,, |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9287 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=NETGEARXX |default_ssid_regex=^NETGEAR[0-9]{2}$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=20:4E:7F,84:1B:5E,E0:46:9A |oui_eth=20:4E:7F,84:1B:5E,E0:46:9A }} {{TagLine|N300 Wireless N Router}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=NETGEAR|model=WNR2000v3|vs_id=17023}}
"2976355102" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :OEM: [[Delta Networks]] {{TechInfoDepot|Netgear_WNR2000_3.0}} (pictures) *[https://web.archive.org/web/20120413005622/http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=84263 '''DD-WRT''' forum thread] (archive.org) *[https://openwrt.org/toh/netgear/wnr2000 ''WNR2000 series'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] <!--The WiFi chip is an AR9283 or AR9287 (most likely, assumed since the OpenWrt wiki mentions it [though as an Ethernet chip for some reason]).--> OUIs may include A0:21:B7 for some model of WNR2000 :(S/N: 2JM2145808666) â€¢ [http://git.chromium.org/gitweb/?p=chromiumos/third_party/autotest.git;a=blob;f=server/cros/chaos_static_ap_list.conf;h=96ffe88e6ec025cb32eabb71d13ca12b0b0feb39;hb=dcaefdda36ec9e3c281d70ccabb2ec900efce1a7 84:1B:5E OUI]
Later model v3s <!--(or some other subset)--> appear to have ''NETGEARXX'' SSID labels.
==Images== <gallery> Image:88_1280619_f2e5256e16c7ec2.jpg|Main board Image:88_1280619_364281f35a38176.jpg|RAM, CPU Image:88_1280619_916971d1e3b2704.jpg|WLAN Image:88_1280619_debdb70f7b39d57.jpg|PIFA Image:88_1280619_45171fbbcce5f42.jpg|Antenna </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
